title: Archive Old Operations Records
description: As per data retention policy, all operational records older than 7 years must be archived.

tasks.description: Run a query to identify all vessel visit records and container histories older than 7 years.
tasks.expected_outcome: The admin generates a list of all records due for archiving.

tasks.description: Export the identified records from the live production database.
tasks.expected_outcome: The old data is successfully exported into an archive file format.

tasks.description: Move the exported files to a long-term, low-cost storage solution and then delete them from the production database.
tasks.expected_outcome: The data is successfully archived, and the production database is purged of the old records, improving performance.
